entry.title: mgomes: wraithdb
entry.content: Embedded NoSQL database for Crystal lang

entry.title: wyhaines: datapack.cr
entry.content: You are building an application, be it web or something else. It has data -- images, CSS, JS, CSV files, whatever -- and you want to be able to easily bundle those into your compiled executable. This shard gives you a simple utility to add this data to your executable, access it, and manage it.
